channel.title: Polk County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Polk County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-18 East at OR-22
item.description: OR-18 east approaching OR-22. OR-22 follows OR-18 east to Willamina.

item.title: OR-18 West at OR-22
item.description: OR-18 west at OR-22 east to Willamina and Salem. OR-22 west joins OR-18 west to Valley Junction.

item.title: OR-18 West Approaching OR-22
item.description: OR-18 west approaching OR-22. Use OR-22 east for Willamina and Salem. OR-22 west joins OR-18 west to Valley Junction.

item.title: OR-18 Bus. Loop Route Diagram
item.description: Diagram of Bus. OR-18 through Willamina and Sheridan on OR-18/OR-22 east.

item.title: OR-18 East at OR-18 Bus.
item.description: OR-18/OR-22 east at Bus. OR-18 to Willamina and Sheridan.

item.title: OR-18 East at OR-22
item.description: OR-18 east approaching OR-22. OR-22 follows OR-18 east to Willamina.

item.title: OR-18 East at OR-22
item.description: OR-18 east at OR-22 west to Hebo and Tillamook. OR-18/OR-22 east continue on to Portland and Salem.

item.title: OR-18 East at OR-22 East
item.description: OR-18/OR-22 east split. OR-18 proceeds east to Portland; OR-22 east to Salem.

item.title: OR-18/OR-22 East - South Yamhill River
item.description: OR-18/OR-22 east at South Yamhill River.

item.title: OR-22 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-22 east to Rickreall and Salem.

item.title: OR-22 East Approaching OR-223
item.description: OR-22 east approaching OR-223 south to Dallas and Kings Valley, 1/2 mile.

item.title: OR-22 East at Bus. OR-99E
item.description: OR-22 east approaching Bus. OR-99E north to I-5/Keizer/Portland, and south to City Center and Albany. OR-99E follows OR-22 south through Salem.

item.title: OR-22 East at OR-223
item.description: OR-22 east to Rickreall and Salem at OR-223 south to Dallas and Kings Valley.

item.title: OR-22 East at OR-99W
item.description: OR-22 east approaching OR-99W to Monmouth and McMinnville.

item.title: OR-22 East Approaching OR-99W
item.description: OR-22 East approaching OR-99W to McMinnville and Monmouth.

item.title: OR-22 East at OR-99W
item.description: OR-22 east at OR-99W. Use OR-99W south to Rickreall Fairgrounds, and Monmouth. Use OR-99W north to McMinnville. Continue east on OR-22 to Salem. This intersection has been replaced with a full interchange.
